warzone.state

Class Phase

  • java.lang.Object
    • warzone.state.Phase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GamePlay, MapEditor

    public abstract class Phase
extends Object
implements Serializable
    State of the State pattern. Here implemented as a abstract class. In this example, the states represent states in the board game Risk. There are many states, and even a hierarchy of states: Phase MapEdit phase (abstract) GamePlay (abstract) In each state, nextState() is defined so that it goes down in
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected GameContext d_gameContext
      current Game Context
      protected GameEngine d_gameEngine
      Contains a reference to the State of the GameEngine so that the state object can change the state of the GameEngine to transition between states.
      protected GamePhase d_gamePhase
      currenet phase

        public abstract void setTournamentMaxTurns(int p_maxTurns)
